# llms.txt - Information for AI/LLM Crawlers
# This file provides context about the website for AI language models

# Site Information
Site: https://robinthomasonline.github.io
Owner: Robin Thomas
Type: Personal Portfolio & Web Applications Showcase
Language: English

# About
Robin Thomas is an Enterprise IT Consultant & Cybersecurity Expert specializing in GRC, Cloud Infrastructure, and DevOps. 
With 10+ years of industry experience, he helps businesses secure their networks, optimize cloud operations, and build scalable software solutions.
Founder of Opsbin (IT Support Services) and Bitstrail (Software Development Company).

# Main Sections
- Home: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/
- About: Professional background and story
- Expertise: IT Security, DevOps, Cloud, GRC, Project Management, Web & Mobile Development
- Experience: Career timeline and work history
- Startups: Opsbin and Bitstrail business information
- Apps: Portfolio of web applications and tools
- Contact: Contact information and social media links

# Web Applications
The site hosts several free web applications:

1. WTFQR - Generate custom QR codes instantly with customizable styling options
   URL: https://wtfqr.com/

2. Work Timer - Productivity timer for tracking work sessions, breaks, and time management
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/timer/

3. Mood Logger - Track emotional wellbeing and mood patterns over time with interactive charts
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/mood/

4. Password Generator - Generate secure, compliant passwords with ISO, PCI, CSA, HIPAA, NIST, and GDPR presets
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/password/

5. Subnet Calculator - Network engineering tool for subnet calculations with binary representation visualization
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/subnet/

6. IP Address Locator - IP geolocation and comprehensive network information tool with interactive map
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/ip/

7. Kanban Board - Drag-and-drop task management board with three-column workflow and CSV export/import
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/kanban/

8. Resume & Cover Letter Generator - AI-powered ATS-friendly resume and cover letter generator using Gemini AI
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/resume-cover/

9. Co-Founder Pie - Calculate fair equity distribution for startup co-founders (2-10 founders) with weighted task scoring
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/cofounder-pie/

10. Daybook - Track income and expenses for small shops with customer details, invoice generation, and data export
    URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/daybook/

11. Image to Favicon Converter - Convert any image to favicon format with multiple sizes (16x16, 32x32, 48x48, etc.)
    URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/favicon/

12. Markdown Converter - Convert Markdown files to DOC and PDF formats instantly with live preview, file upload support, and word count
    URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/md/

13. MyRTA Booking System Monitor - Free browser extension that monitors MyRTA booking availability changes and alerts you when new test dates become available. Works with Chrome, Edge, and other Chromium browsers.
    URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/sydney_myrta_booking_system_monitoring_system/

# Usage Guidelines

- Content is for informational and portfolio purposes
- Applications demonstrate technical skills and capabilities

# Technical Stack
